channel.title: GitHub Bicep Monthly Trending
channel.description: Monthly Trending of Bicep in GitHub

item.title: Azure-Samples/contoso-chat
item.description: This sample has the full End2End process of creating RAG application with Prompty and Azure AI Foundry. It includes GPT 3.5 Turbo LLM application code, evaluations, deployment automation with AZD CLI, GitHub actions for evaluation and deployment and intent mapping for multiple LLM task mapping.

item.title: github-copilot-resources/copilot-metrics-viewer
item.description: Tool to visualize the Copilot metrics provided via the Copilot Business Metrics API (current in public beta)

item.title: Azure/bicep
item.description: Bicep is a declarative language for describing and deploying Azure resources

item.title: microsoft/azure-container-apps
item.description: Roadmap and issues for Azure Container Apps

item.title: Azure-Samples/aks-store-demo
item.description: Sample microservices app for AKS demos, tutorials, and experiments

item.title: Azure/GPT-RAG
item.description: Sharing the learning along the way we been gathering to enable Azure OpenAI at enterprise scale in a secure manner. GPT-RAG core is a Retrieval-Augmented Generation pattern running in Azure, using Azure Cognitive Search for retrieval and Azure OpenAI large language models to power ChatGPT-style and Q&A experiences.

item.title: Azure/ALZ-Bicep
item.description: This repository contains the Azure Landing Zones (ALZ) Bicep modules that help deliver and deploy the Azure Landing Zone conceptual architecture in a modular approach. https://aka.ms/alz/docs

item.title: Azure-Samples/dotNET-FrontEnd-to-BackEnd-on-Azure-Container-Apps
item.description: This repository demonstrates a typical front-end UI built with ASP.NET and a complementary back-end API.

item.title: Azure-Samples/PetSpotR
item.description: Demo application that showcases a modern, cloud-native application
